title: Part A i
stimulusHtml:
The response can earn up to 4 points:

1 point: For the rotational form of Newton’s second law

τ = I α

1 point: For a correct expression of the magnitude of torque

1 point: For correctly labeling the torque as negative

− M g x sin ⁡ θ = I b α

1 point: For expressing α as the second time derivative of θ

− M g x sin ⁡ θ = I b ( d 2 θ d t 2 )
descriptions:
The response earns none of the following points:

1 point: For the rotational form of Newton’s second law

τ = I α

1 point: For a correct expression of the magnitude of torque

1 point: For correctly labeling the torque as negative

− M g x sin ⁡ θ = I b α

1 point: For expressing α as the second time derivative of θ

− M g x sin ⁡ θ = I b ( d 2 θ d t 2 )

The response earns one of the following points:

1 point: For the rotational form of Newton’s second law

τ = I α

1 point: For a correct expression of the magnitude of torque

1 point: For correctly labeling the torque as negative

− M g x sin ⁡ θ = I b α

1 point: For expressing α as the second time derivative of θ

− M g x θ = I b ( d 2 θ d t 2 )

The response earns two of the following points:

1 point: For the rotational form of Newton’s second law

τ = I α

1 point: For a correct expression of the magnitude of torque

1 point: For correctly labeling the torque as negative

− M g x sin ⁡ θ = I b α

1 point: For expressing α as the second time derivative of θ

− M g x sin ⁡ θ = I b ( d 2 θ d t 2 )

The response earns three of the following points:

1 point: For the rotational form of Newton’s second law

τ = I α

1 point: For a correct expression of the magnitude of torque

1 point: For correctly labeling the torque as negative

− M g x sin ⁡ θ = I b α

1 point: For expressing α as the second time derivative of θ

− M g x sin ⁡ θ = I b ( d 2 θ d t 2 )

The response earns all of the following points:

1 point: For the rotational form of Newton’s second law

τ = I α

1 point: For a correct expression of the magnitude of torque

1 point: For correctly labeling the torque as negative

− M g x sin ⁡ θ = I b α

1 point: For expressing α as the second time derivative of θ

− M g x sin ⁡ θ = I b ( d 2 θ d t 2 )

title: Part A ii
stimulusHtml:
The response earns none of the following points:

1 point: For the appropriate small angle approximation

1 point: For small angles, sin ⁡ θ ≈ θ

− M g x sin ⁡ θ = I b ( d 2 θ d t 2 )

( d 2 θ d t 2 ) + ( M g x I b ) θ = 0

1 point: For recognizing that the coefficient of θ is ω 2

ω 2 = M g x I b

1 point: For the relationship between T and ω

T = 2 π ω

1 point: For the final expression for T

T = 2 π I b M g x

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
The response can earn up to 5 points:

For an experimental procedure that includes:

1 point: A valid approach

2 point: How the variables will be measured or calculated, including equipment to be used

1 point: How these variables will be used to determine IB

1 point: How to minimize error
descriptions:
The response earns none of the following points:

For an experimental procedure that includes:

1 point: An experimental procedure that includes:

1 point: A valid approach

2 point: How the variables will be measured or calculated, including equipment to be used

1 point: How these variables will be used to determine IB

1 point: How to minimize error

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
The response can earn up to 2 points:

1 point: For a valid procedure to locate the center of mass

1 point: For specifying the equipment to be used
descriptions:
The response earns none of the following points:

1 point: For a valid procedure to locate the center of mass

1 point: For specifying the equipment to be used
